# Accounts Methods

#### `provider.getBalance(accountLike) ⇒ Promise<`[`BigNumber`](../../utilities/bignumber.md)`>`

&#x20;   Returns the tinybar balance of an _accountLike_.

```typescript
await provider.getBalance("0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000062");
// 977699136825241

await provider.getBalance("0.0.98");
// 977699136825241
```

#### `provider.getCode(accountLike [throwOnNonExisting = false ]) ⇒ Promise< string<`[`DataHexString`](../../utilities/byte-manipulation.md#datahexstring)`>>`

&#x20;   Returns the contract code of an _accountLike_. If there is no contract currently deployed, the result is `0x`.

```typescript
await provider.getCode("0x000000000000000000000000000000000186fb1a"); 
// ''

await provider.getCode("0.0.25623322");
// ''

await provider.getCode("0.0.98");
// '0x'

await provider.getCode("0.0.98", true);
// throws exception since address is Account
```
